entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the evening except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the evening and after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
